headline: Is Synchrony Financial (SYF) Pricing In Its Recent 11% Slide And Credit Card Partnerships?
summary: If you are wondering whether Synchrony Financial at around US$77.82 offers good value today, you are not alone. This article focuses squarely on what that price might mean for long term investors. The stock has recently seen an 11.0% decline over the past 7 days and a 6.5% decline over the past 30 days. However, the 1 year return stands at 16.3% and the 3 year return is about 1.5x. Recent news flow around Synchrony Financial has largely centered on its role as a major private label and co...
